activities.name: Merge Data
activities.description: cdi-root / Industry / 외부 / 소비자_생산자물가지수 에 통합본을 저장합니다.

source.query:
with vw_date as 
( 
select  to_char(generate_series('20251001'::date, '20251001'::date, INTERVAL '1 month'),'YYMM') AS yymm 
)
select a.yymm, b.code as city_code from vw_date a, cd_ods.tb_sf_bluesis_area_master b

query.value: select '@{variables('yymm')}' as yymm, b.code as city_code from cd_ods.tb_sf_bluesis_area_master b

select distinct yymm, city3_code as city_code
from cd_ods.tb_sf_bluesis_product_info_t
where yymm = '@{variables('yymm')}'

source.query:
with vw_date as 
( 
select  to_char(generate_series('20251001'::date, '20251001'::date, INTERVAL '1 month'),'YYMM') AS yymm 
)
select distinct a.yymm, b.city3_code as city_code
from vw_date a 
join  cd_ods.tb_sf_bluesis_product_info_t b
on a.yymm = b.yymm

preCopyScript.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_d2b_bid_item_detail
 WHERE demandyear = '@{variables('demandyear')}' 
  AND  dcsno = '@{variables('dcsno')}'
  AND  orntcode = '@{variables('orntcode')}'
  ;

delete from  cd_ods.tb_d2b_bid_item_detail
 WHERE demandyear = '@{variables('demandyear')}' 
  AND  dcsno = '@{variables('dcsno')}'
  AND  orntcode = '@{variables('orntcode')}'
  ;

query.value:
SELECT demandyear , dcsno , orntcode ,  pblancNo, pblancOdr
FROM 
(
SELECT COALESCE (b.dcsno, 'xxxxx') AS b_dcsno 
     , a.dcsno AS dcsno
     , a.orntcode  AS orntcode
     , a.pblancno AS pblancno
     , a.pblancOdr AS pblancOdr
     , a.demandyear  AS demandyear
FROM cd_ods.tb_d2b_cmpt_bid_notice_list a
  LEFT OUTER join   cd_ods.tb_d2b_cmpt_bid_notice_detail b
on a.dcsno  = b.dcsno
  AND a.pblancno = b.pblancno
  AND a.pblancOdr = b.pblancOdr
  AND a.pblancdate  = b.pblancdate 
) a
WHERE a.b_dcsno = 'xxxxx'
